title: TypeCon Blogging
content:
TypeCon Buffalo organizers have signed up a crack squad of A-list live-bloggers (and me) to cover the upcoming event. If you have any pre-announcements, gossip, ideas or other info to share send it along to [blog@typecon.com](mailto:blog@typecon.com) - so we can get the blog rolling in the run up to the big show.

Cheers, Si

 [‹ Stone on Type vs Writing](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907014409/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45708 "Go to previous forum topic") [Does this type treatment bother anyone else? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907014409/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46729 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sii

comments.content: Is there an RSS feed? I don’t see anything on the site.
Does this mean that you’ll be running around typing away furiously on an iPhone?

\>Is there an RSS feed? I don’t see anything on the site.

Laurence said that it should be working. I’ll check.

\>Does this mean that you’ll be running around typing away furiously on an iPhone?

Something like that. The plan is to document stuff live, as it happens.

OK, excellent.  
This saves me from having to do my promised daily entry on the SIG in typophile.  
Take it away Sii

The RSS is at:

[http://www.typecon.com/talk/wp-rss.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907014409/http:/www.typecon.com/talk/wp-rss.php "http://www.typecon.com/talk/wp-rss.php")

After getting the RSS icon showing in the browser address bar, I’d forgotten to add a visual link... It’s there now.

Pong.
